related_questions.question: Tolong yang bisa bantu soal diatas

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Hey, Happy Birthday! You're (Age) Now, You're very grown and wise congrats!

Congratulations on your Graduation! we're all very proud of you!

Congratulations! It's a beautiful and healthy baby boy/girl

Oh my, Congratulations on your Wedding! Hope you two live a happy life together

Congrats on passing the Exam! You're a very diligent student

Semoga membantu dan menjadi jawaban terbaik ya :)

related_questions.question: We (go) to the beach two week ago​

answers.answer:
(went=past tense of go)
so “we went to the beach 2 weeks ago”
jangan lupa kalau weeknya lebih dari satu pakai “s” (weeks)

related_questions.question: We (go) to the beach two week ago​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

we went to the beach two weeks ago

Penjelasan:

past tense jd v2

Jawaban:

We went to the beach two weeks ago

Penjelasan:

Past tense merupakan kata yang digunakan untuk menjelaskan kejadian yang telah terjadi di masa lampau.

Perbedaannya dengan present tense adalah verb yang digunakan.

Present tense menggunakan verb 1, dan past tense menggunakan verb 2.

Maka verb 2 dari go adalah:

go → went

Past Tense Sentences:

We went to the beach two weeks ago

related_questions.question: Isilah bagian yang kosong dengan bentuk lampau (VERB/TO BE) 1. dia....(adalah) cantik​

6 What is the purpose of the message above ?    7. who sent the message ?
8. who will join the next competition ?
Recording the film is prohibited
toonsidering pir by
Piracy is a crime.
9. Where do you probably find this Notice?
10. The notice above means that​
What does do on seturday morning

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

HARI SABTU:

-BEROLAHRAGA

-MEMBERSIHKAN RUMAH

-MELAKUKAN HOBI

-MENGEMBANGKAN BAKAT

-MEMULAI BISNIS

-Menata Kembali to-do-list.

SEMOGA BERMANFAAT YA :)

Jawaban:

What do you do on Saturday morning?

I usually go swimming in the stadium on Saturday morning.

Penjelasan:

Aku biasanya pergi berenang di stadion pada hari Sabtu pagi. Kalimat menggunakan bentuk Simple Present Tense karena menjelaskan tentang kebiasaan yang dilakukan setiap hari Sabtu pagi.

Simple Present Tense:

(+) Subject + usually + Verb-1 S/ES + Object

Semoga membantu ya.

*
rich
O O O
O lazy
O handsome
O
O
smart​

answers.answer:

Penjelasan:

Kebalikan dari miskin adalah kaya, dalam bahasa Inggris "rich"

related_questions.question:
Anton,_____, passed away yesterday morning    a. to whom I talked last week
b. to which I talked last week
c. to who I talked last week
d. to whose I talked last week
e. to where I talked last week
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

a) to whom I talked last week

Penjelasan:

kita pakai relative clause whom saat membicarakan object di sebuah kalimat:

- kata 'I' merupakan subject karena 'I' berada di belakang verb 'talked', artinya yang berbicara itu saya

- sedangkan kata 'Anton' disini adalah object menunjukkan kepada siapa saya berbicara
